#include<vector>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<cstdio>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
ll mod=1000000007;
ll minv;
ll mpow(ll a,ll b)
{
if(b==0)return 1;
ll ans=mpow((a*a)%mod,b/2);
if(b%2==1)ans*=a;
return ans%mod;
}
ll mans(ll x)
{
if(x<0)return 0;
ll ans=(mpow(26,x+1) - 1 + mod)%mod;
ans*=minv;
return ans%mod;
}
ll doit()
{
ll l;
scanf("%lld",&l);
char inp[100003];
scanf("%s",inp);
int n=0;
while(inp[n]!='\0')n++;
vector<ll> dp(n+1,0);
dp[n]=mans(l-n);
for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
{
if(l>=i)dp[i]=1;
dp[i]+=(inp[i]-'a'+1)*dp[i+1];
dp[i]%=mod;
}
ll ans=0;
for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
{
ll s=(inp[i]-'a')*dp[i+1];
ans+=(s%mod);
ans%=mod;
}
ans+=mod;
ans+=min((ll)n,l)-1;
if(l<n)ans++;
return ans%mod;
}
int main()
{
int t;
minv=mpow(25,mod-2);
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
printf("%lld\n",doit());
}
return 0;
}
